alert.note: Alert for Niagara (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:46PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NIAGARA COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 8 miles west of Lewiston, or 9 miles northwest of Niagara Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph are possible well ahead of the main cluster of thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Niagara Falls, Lockport, Newfane, Lewiston, Youngstown, Fort Niagara State Park, Sanborn, Wilson, Cambria Center, Olcott, Pendleton Center, Ransomville, Model City, and Appleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
